issue.title: [FEATURE] Expect warning / notice
[PHPUnit] feature: add rule to refactor exception methods

repository.name: rector
repository.description: Instant Upgrades and Automated Refactoring of any PHP 5.3+ code

body:
There is now a rector for this change: 
https://github.com/rectorphp/rector/blob/a49fb729e013f47c47bef062e81c31985fd2f322/docs/rector_rules_overview.md#explicitphperrorapirector
